notes: Machine-readable catalog of assets imported under docs/EVA-2.0/ESDC for EVA 2.0 planning.

sources.summary: Repository index and agile command resources for all eva-* projects.
Email memo detailing omnichannel EVA vision, assistant personas, and technology stack assumptions.
Folder of CDD and roadmap DOCX files covering APIs, governance, live ops, session-aware wrappers, and accelerator programs.
Governance and sandbox enablement playbooks for provisioning EVA environments.
Historic PDFs/DOCX covering EVA capability evolution, roadmaps, and sandbox slide decks.
React/Vite demo showcasing project registry CRUD, AppAdmin UI, mock APIM, bilingual theming, and scripts for EVA DA v0.75.
Pointers to critical artifacts within the EVA 1.0 demo for diffing and reference.
Curated copy of EVA 1.0 artifacts including admin backlog, APIM contract, deployment guide, and component sources.
Architecture overview, fastlane demo scope, UI metadata design, and EVA API contract for the Azure demo.
Definition of done and priority per eva-* repo for fastlane demo readiness.
AI briefs for each eva-* repo with context, priorities, and tasks for pair programming.
Express implementation sketch covering /projects, /layouts/:pageId, /assets, /templates, and /rag/answer with safety + metering stubs.
Project registry sample defining Canada Life, Jurisprudence, and Admin spaces with theming and i18n keys.
Generic layout renderer consuming metadata-defined sections and component registry.
JSON corpus describing Marco's identity, preferences, values, project dossiers, EVA architecture, prompt patterns, and workflows.
Standard meeting summary schema with context, decisions, actions, and attachments.
